main event: On 28 August 1951 in Indianapolis, Ind., a UFO sighting was reported as a light approaching from the west, hovering in the sky for 1 to 2 minutes, and then disappearing with intervals of what appeared to be flame showing and a purple color at 1500 ft.
interesting points: The UFO sighting was reported by Cincinatti Flight 1900 Central Standard Time on 14 Aug 51.
The craft appeared to hover for 1 to 2 minutes before disappearing.
Intermittent flames were observed during the sighting, showing a purple color.
The message requested verification and additional information about the sighting.
The Department of the Air Force identified the observed object as a research balloon.
sighted object: unidentified object appearing as a light with intermittent flames and purple color
